name: OPPOSITES ATTRACT (James B Barrow)
description:
Opposites Attract is a fun, if only mildly infuriating, platformer with a simple magnet mechanic.

Play as a small happy magnet on a mission to rescue your magnet friend, who has been taken by a mean fridge.

What's the fastest time you can complete the game in?

***KNOWN ISSUES***
- *THIS ONLY AFFECTS THE MENU SCREEN* If your completion time has a seconds value above 30, it will display the minutes as one minute above what it actually is. It is displayed correctly on the game completion screen.
(e.g. 6:29.00 will display correctly but 6:31.00 will display as 7:31.00) 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 
- Movement: Left and right arrow keys : or A & D
- Flip Magnet: Spacebar
- Pause Game: Escape

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game created in Unity. 
All game content was made by me within the game jam time frame, the large majority of it live on my twitch! 

I had a blast making this game, and I hope you enjoy it! :D

- James B Barrow
